name: Ray Bradford
text: Its a very nice place to go for a pizza or pasta dish. Very well kept and up to date. The pizza was great and the service was on point. I do recommend stopping in with the whole family..

name: Brooke Taylor
text: Every time we come here the service is exceptional.  Good pizza and great service— what more can you ask for? Toni (pretty sure she’s the boss here) is amazing— always providing excellent customer service and genuinely cares about your …More

name: ernest chritton
text: Literally the best.  Less then 20 dollars for a pizza salad and a soda.  Maybe some fancy new york place might have a better crust but this place crushes the usual suspects of dominos etc.

name: Antonio Grosso
text: Went here after a long day of painting my new place and I had forgotten my wallet but had one old credit card. When I got to the front my card was declined. I panicked and tried to set up apple or see if I could pay on my phone, their …More

name: Jason Searles
text: This establishment only care about the employees and the customers money.   Horrible experience today.  Will NEVER go back.    This place needs to change their policies and put the focus on the customer.    I have never been so offended in my life.    Be aware and stay away.

name: Joshua Parr
text: Better food... Better pizza... Blaze Pizza. 😉 But in all seriousness, blaze is a great pizza place. Bringing you great service and custom personal pizzas in 10 minutes or less. They even have salads for all of you people that are watching your carbs. I fully recommend Blaze Pizza as it offers a unique pizza experience and great value.

name: Erik Leary
text: I had heard great things about Blaze, so I decided to try it out. It wasn't as good as expected, but I did enjoy it. Mine was a little burnt which may be why I didn't love it. Great atmosphere and all the people were super chill. I'll give …More

name: Drei Potente
text: Fun pizza place to hangout with group of friends! Love that we can customize and build our own pizzas!

name: Wesley White
text: My wife and I are low carbs and their keto crust is awesome. We have never found a keto pizza option until we found Blaze. We love the variety of sauces, proteins, toppings, and finishes. The Cesar salad was huge. Great pizza for a great price.

name: Shaura Clerici
text: This place has the BEST PIZZA EVER!!! I totally recommend this place. I always get the mushroom pizza with cauliflower crust and it’s so delicious my daughter always gets the classic cheese pizza and she loves it so much she always eats the pizza . There also so fast at making the pizza. So I totally recommend.

name: L. Wyatt
text: The pizza here is pretty good. They are made to order and always come out nice fresh! They have a lot of different toppings to choose from and they don’t take a very long time to make. Only reason I didn’t give a full 5 stars is because the …More

name: Pedro Lovera
text: The experience of crafting your own pizza with quality ingredients from the fullfilling yet crispy original thin crust dough to the italian meatball and the drizzle options at the end from pesto to bbq its just honestly a well thought out business model and the ultimate experience of personal pizza. I loved it! I will be back again.

name: Rita Jordan
text: Lots of options for people who don't do pizza! I build my own salaf and they are huge! Enough for 2 meals and great vegetables, meat, and cheese choices!

name: Christy K.
text: I was coming every week until the state lockdown. Every pizza I order is fantastic. Just had one yesterday (6/23). Om my, yummy! I do wish they were closer since I travel about 40 miles round trip. The pizza is so good and the workers are great! Thank you, Blaze!

name: Beachside Dreams
text: The pizza is fantastic. You can put as many toppings as you want and they are all high quality.  Plus the pizza is done super quickly.

name: Tayler Mannain
text: It was a very fun and delicious experience. They had a fresh and wide range of selection to make you pizza and your own salad. The garlic knots were unique from any I’ve ever tried. I found it helpful that they already have their to go …More

name: Jack B
text: Pizza was really good, my only problem was the pizza was a hair thin, but other than that the service was great, would recommend!

name: Mickey85
text: You get to make your own pizza so you can't mess that up. Service is excellent. I really like the concept.

name: Olivia Y.
text: The pizza was delicious but it was a pretty loud, chaotic environment inside. Outside seating is preferred because it's more peaceful and quiet. Unfortunately the person topping the pizza doesn't know how much a half is and put meat on more …More

name: chloeideekay
text: Everyone here is so nice!! Love the atmosphere. But ayo when i ask for a little bit of oregano then just give me like a LITTLE bit. A little tiny pinch. Thx <3

name: Madelyn Keoss
text: Great pizza. Very clean. Polite and helpful staff. It’s a win win win as Michael Scott would say.

name: Jessica Buczkowski
text: LOVE coming to this place!!! It's nice that we only have one around here so they can focus better!

name: CJ
text: There was a line to the door but it moves very quickly. Nice concept to making your own pizzas. It was very good and fresh tasting. One has artichokes jalapenos arugula tomato pepperoni bacon and burrata with red sauce. The other has …More

name: Greg Mix
text: Great personal size pizza.  If you dont like the specialty pizzas go with build your own.  Great deal

name: Debra Tracy
text: The food and service were great but it's very loud. Would definitely recommend though.

name: Delia Perdomo
text: First time here. I had heard good things about them and it was great. I got to pick everything starting with the sauce and I love it. The crust was crispy but not in a dry way.  Perfect blend of cheese and toppings and cooked all the way without burning pizza. Definitely coming back!👍

name: Betty Scott
text: Very fresh. Prices are awesome. Love the idea that you pick any toppings you want.

name: Nancy Hawk
text: GREAT pizza, GREAT service! It was my first time at Blaze Pizza, I was so lost I went to the wrong side of the restaurant luckily the manager, Nico, was there to guide me through the whole process. The whole staff was super friendly and I will DEFINITELY be coming back. :)

name: Denny Coats
text: We ordered a pepperoni and mushroom pizza, light cheese and extra tomato sauce.  I ordered two side salads. This is the third time we have ordered from the Viera, Fl location and the pizza crust was wet and droopy. The lettuce was almost …More

name: Eddie EDWARDS
text: Nice family place. Good food at reasonable prices. Would like to have location in Palm Bay,West Melbourne or Melbourne.

name: Shaun Caruthers
text: Great concept of ordering food and good individual pizza's you don't have to share😁

name: Jon H
text: This is an absolutely awesome pizza place in the Viera area of Melbourne.  I hope they will build more of these around Melbourne.  This is the best gluten free, dairy free pizza I have had yet.  It was delicious!  I will definitely be going back to get some of their yummy pizza!

name: Lori Crouch
text: First time at Blaze pizza.  So good. I got the veg out pizza. Super easy to order and customize. They even have an app to make ordering faster.

name: Christina Green
text: Delicious thin crispy crust personal size pizzas delicious

name: Christopher Barr
text: Always amazing when we come here. Staff is friendly and always on point with our order.

name: Kristen Robinson
text: I have heard about this place but was unable to eat pizza because of the way I am eating these day. Not anymore! Thank you Blaze Pizza for offering this awesome Keto pizza crust. It was amazing! The staff was very friendly and very helpful. They even had a smile on!

name: Deana Riggs
text: Excellent! Ordered 2 pizzas and they were cooked perfectly and tasted delicious! Nice people also.

name: Evija Vilde
text: The place is amazing, it is always clean, staff is super friendly, food is delicious and even curbside pickup is always really quick! I try to go there at least once a week!

name: Tony Diaz
text: Super cool consept, fast 🍕pizza it was done in 3min. Great tasting too I will be back.

name: Fallon McKenzie
text: I knew I wanted to try this place when I saw the construction. Finally tried it Saturday night. It was so good I forgot to take pics until we were almost done with our 3rd pizza. The street corn pizza was amazing, the feta and mozerella …More

name: Ruthie Allart-Weyant
text: Very yummy. All employees wearing masks!

name: Chensi Ouyang
text: Great service. Very fast. Thin-crust pizza with lots of customizations. Salad and dough nuts were also super busy. Definitely high on my list for a quick, yummy bite that’s also open late hours!

name: Harrison Gallagher
text: Great food, decent price, and I got a free drink.

name: Olga Vasquez
text: Excellent quality pizza. Absolutely delicious!

name: Jeffrey Econom
text: The staff is super friendly, the place is immaculately clean and the pizza is DELICIOUS. You cant beat this pizza for the price. Thin crust flash cooked pizza. I highly recommend this place.

name: Timothy Kehoe
text: The pizza is awesome and the staff is always friendly..... I would recommend to anyone....

name: Walter Parsons
text: Blaze is great - they make your pizza in front of you with the amount of toppings that you want. Quick and delicious!

name: Ann Goodrich
text: Very friendly, clean and the pizza and salad was amazing.

name: Manjusha Nadipineni
text: I love their gluten free options 👌🏻

name: Camiren Stewart
text: Make your own pizza for reasonable prices? Also in love with their garlic knots.

name: Jeneric
text: Seems like the pizza could be good but if this is any indication of a typical pie- I will never go back! Burnt cheese, not in a good way, cheese and sauce completely lacking in the middle (probably from the metal “ticket” in the middle …More

name: Don Cole
text: Excellent!!! Plenty of toppings to choose from for your pizza and your salads. Great flavors and excellent value. Get the app to earn points and take advantage of deals.

name: Mikey Bellairs
text: Amazing food. Comes out really fast. Friendly staff.

name: Lindsay Nedley
text: It has a "Subway" type setup except fresher and better food but pick your own toppings and fast fire your pizza.

name: Molly Gores
text: Blaze is amazing! There are endless options, and everything tastes amazing! I love that they deliver too!

name: Barbara Kobe
text: Been here about 4 times. My last 2 times were the best because the staff was extremely organized as they helped me build my own pizza and salad.  I'm glad to say they stepped up their efficiency.   The pizza and salad have always fresh and delicious.

name: Deborah Hahnenkamp
text: This was my first visit and the staff and food was amazing!  Our family has a new favorite spot to eat!

name: Christian Loris
text: My kids love the place and as much as I am sold on the concept, I have never been wow'd by the implementation.  My Pizzas have had mixed success with the crusts, sometimes they are undercooked and floppy and other times they have the …More

name: Shelby Marmol
text: Subway/chipotle style pizza. So good and cheap!!!

name: Ki Wasabi
text: For $9 you can get a good wood oven fired pizza with all the toppings you can imagine at no extra charge, the flavor is great, crust is great, toppings are good quality, overall best pizza ive ever had 10/10 recommend.

name: Tiffany Sanders
text: I've gone to this Blaze close to ten times and it's consistently delicious. (I had Blaze Pizza at the Houston airport and even THAT was delicious!) I love that they've introduced cauliflower and keto options on their menu, and it's not …More

name: TT
text: Let me just tell you... Great personalities! Super fast. Great taste. Clean. Inviting. Very knowledgeable and willing to help. Great crew there! My favorite lil pizza place.

name: Jason McGhan
text: Blaze Pizza is probably my top recommended place in Viera. Each pizza I've had has been incredible and cooked very well. It's been packed every time I've been there, but the turnaround time is very quick. I'd recommend getting the unlimited toppings option and loading that baby up with garlic. Never a bad idea.

name: Lily Bee
text:
We LOVE their keto pizza!
Taking my sister in law tomorrow for a Gluten free, dairy free pizza for her.

name: Jairo Bernal
text: So, it’s Friday and the place it’s crowded. I came to order a large pizza not knowing that it’s online only.  The manager then sent someone to me to do the order for me on my phone. Great service. Great place

name: Ryan Gordon
text: Great food! Clean and quick what else do you need.

name: Shane Graefe
text:
The nicest thing I can say,it's new and different..real.pizza,it's not
I didn't bother with pictures,because the ones posted here tell the story quite well;the "good that looks bad" pizza ,"the bad that looks worse" pizza the UFO …More

name: Nichole Parrish
text: My favorite place! Any toppings you want at great price.. def worth it!

name: Nadine Higgins
text: Pretty Good! I'm hoping that they will have anchovies for extra kick!

name: kohlton houfer
text: Absolutely one of the best places I’ve been in a long time. Super clean super genuine and polite. Not to mention the pizza was cooked phenomenally and we had a party of 15+ and not one complaint. Another plus is the bathrooms very well kept clean and very pleasant smells. Overall outstanding.

name: Nick Gerry
text: Best pizza and salads..a must go place to try..you will not regret it!

name: Sean Hynes
text: Great pizza at a great price. They are always busy but never struggle to keep the line moving. Vegan friendly.

name: William Henzmann
text: Always a fun experience and good food. Staff was on point today.  I forgot to ask for a topping and asked later down the line which can mess up thier flow,  they didn't even blink... just took care of it with a smile. All good reasons to keep coming back.  👍

name: Jason Lee
text: Nice place a little outside the Avenues to grab a bite. The ordering was unique but efficient and the service was patient as we decided each aspect of the custom pizza at the counter. …More

name: Gerry Cullison
text: Excellent pizza and salads.

name: Leland Eymer
text: This place is great. You have the option to build your own pizza with as much toppings as you want, for a very reasonable price. They cook it for you and you get it in just a few minutes. They also have some very tasty drinks with some interesting and yummy flavor combinations. I would definitely eat here again.

name: Kacy P.
text: Great pizza with tons of choices, nice area to sit, craft soda in the fountains. Garlic knots were the best!

name: Natalie LaFlamme
text: We love Blaze Pizza! It's fast, and delicious! We love all of their choices for make-your-own pizza and salad. They offer healthy choices so you don't have to feel guilty after eating there. It's also affordable. For a big family like we have, that's important. The service has always been amazing. Blaze Pizza is our new favorite!

name: Richard Webb
text: Extremely thin delicious crust with wide selection of toppings, plus a custom salad. Get dressing on the side so you can control it. Looking forward to going again.

name: Arlene Williams
text: Very quick and friendly service. Excellent menu choices plus the option to build your own pizza. I would suggest putting a menu on the wall where the line starts so that people can decide prior to getting to the counter.

name: Carol Gamber
text: Was not that  a big of a deal for a pizza place but luckily I was with my granddaughters. They made me realize that sometimes the experience and the atmosphere are a major ingredient to the meal.  Had a good lunch and great overall experience. Leave the grey hair tude at the door and have fun. I did

name: APlusLook
text: I like the concept  but the veggies didn't taste fresh and my pizza was undercooked.  I would give it one more chance.

name: Greg Griffith
text: Nice place if you are looking for a quick bite to eat. Fresh ingredients and ultra great service.  It can get busy around lunch and dinner times.

name: Matt Quetot
text: Great pizza, fast friendly service. Love this place.

name: Justin Best
text: Loved it so much we went back for dinner the very next night. EXCELLENT taste, texture and value. You will love this place of you love thin crust pizza, no doubt. Clean, fast and friendly.

name: Rob Harris
text: This was my first visit to a Blaze Pizza. It was very neat; I liked being able to create the pizza the way I wanted it. There are lots and lots of choices for ingredients and sauces and cheeses. It was cooked perfectly and we ate outside. …More

name: Ryan Roberts
text:
This is by far our favorite restaurant.

Blaze uses high quality ingredients. It's fast. It's fresh. It's family …More

name: Chris Navarro
text: Meat eater plus roasted garlic and jalapeno

name: Jeremy Carmean
text:
LOVE the pizza and the people who work there! Kristen made my pizza exactly the way I WANTED IT! and you can get no better than that!
Customer service ✓ …More

name: williams di
text:
Such good and tasty pizza like always.
A pesto drizzle makes everything good!

name: Ben Beaumont
text: Love Blaze. Fast and good.The black cherry soda is worth the visit alone. Keep in mind it comes out clear.... Could be cheaper but whatya gonna do?

name: Bunny King
text: Decent fast food pizza. Can get busy at times. They accommodate vegans and gluten free diet preferences. You can get a beer with your pizza. Sit inside or out.

name: Borrrel Vigo
text: Great place to eat wonderful pizza, build your own pizza with your favorite ingredients! 100% recommended

name: Jen McKinney
text: Great atmosphere and food!! We had a good time, staff was awesome.  Fun, quick date night food.

name: Joe Norton
text: My go to for fast/delicious pizza.

name: Erica
text: Blaze is my go to for quick brick oven pizza. I l-o-v-e the fact that they offer white sauce. The varied pizza options are fantastic.

name: Brittney Lemons
text: Subway style build your own pizza but with fresher ingredients. Went for spirit night for school. I ordered a salad, delicious, and half a pizza.

name: R. ZeiGgy
text: Great place to eat for lunch and dinner!

name: Adam Tritt
text: It's great to know that there is a place with vegan crust (normal crust) gluten free, keto and cauliflower crusts plus I can get the pizza without cheese (vegan cheese is an option too). And it's still wonderful. …More

name: Denise Holden
text: I went for the keto pizza and was not disappointed.  Fast lunchtime service made it enjoyable without worry of being late. It was a clean and organized with a system that worked like a well oiled machine.

name: John Hoog
text: Good pizza, plenty of topping choices. Didn't care for the burnt bits under the pizza, they need to clean the oven.

name: Stephanie B.
text: Super fresh ingredients made right in front of you. Gluten free crust options along with Keto and veggie crusts. The half and half lunch deal is great and more than enough to feed the average person. The drink prices are a little high, but there are several specialty type of beverages, flavored tea and lemonades.

name: Tina Gallentine
text: The pizza here is really good. You get to watch the workers make your pizza and you get to tell them what you want on it. Kind of like Subway. Pizza is so delicious and you can get a salad with it if you want.

name: Michael Pence
text: Pretty solid choice,  best description I always hear is chipotle of pizza.  As long as you get normal crust is a cheap lunch and the gluten alternatives are nice for the keto people.

name: Gilbert Pohl
text: My wife and I went here for lunch. We had to "Build It Yourself" pizzas. I had a combination pizza with lots of meat and veggies. It was wonderful. I will eat here again.

name: Kimberly Gilbert
text: Quick, clean, friendly staff. Love the pizza and the variety of fresh toppings and not charged extra for each topping. Can't beat the price. Most definitely going back!

name: noodles725
text: 10/10. Not gonna explain why its fantastic. Go there and eat for yourself. Thank me later.

name: Jenny Soto
text: They are great they are always friendly and they are really efficient, the food get out on time. I wish I could order over the phone. But their app is really easy to use

name: Chris D
text: The pizza is fresh made and you get to chose the toppings. They have so many toppings to choose from.

name: james rosado
text: Loved it. Usually a long line but they move really fast

name: Carly Lazear
text: Great food, great service! Was reluctant to try the cauliflower crust but super enjoyed it- so nice to have real keto options out there!

name: Bex Catlover
text: They make cauliflower crust delicious. However it does cook faster so it was a little dark and crispy but still liked it.

name: richard matthes
text: Fun being able to create your own personalized pizza and ingredients are fresh. Solid A.

name: KAF
text: So delicious!! Love that you can build your own with limitless toppings and the offerings of crust is sure to appease anyone! I love that I can order right from the app, run in, and grab my pizzas!

name: patrick jordan
text: Great place for a pie.   Great price unlimited toppings who could ask for anything more for under $9.00.

name: Dubaifz Fz
text: Cam is really helpful and always offer to change gloves for my order!! It's good food with trustworthy service.

name: Richard Beam
text: Always great staff, pizza the way you like hot and fresh. Build your own pizza, always the choice, you can get gorgonzola cheese, artichoke, several sauces. it is like the jimmy johns of pizza Freaky Fast!

name: Kathy Foster
text: We had a great experience at Blaze. It was fast and delicious. Everyone behind the line was friendly and seemed interested in what you wanted. Will go back! The restaurant should try to recycle. Shouldn't be hard...there is a recycling bin in the parking lot!

name: Matthew Bennett
text: Tasty thin crust pizza fired fresh in minutes. Make your own pizza with a large variety of unlimited sauces, cheeses, and toppings for a set price. Best enjoyed immediately as crust doesn't hold its crispness on a long drive home. Very tasty!

name: Kimberly Gomez
text: Great food, awesome, friendly atmosphere. Loved the pizza oven and creating my own pizza.

name: Joel Shuy
text: Good, friendly staff, nice place to meet for lunch and chat. Relaxed atmosphere. Inside or outside option. Pricing is reasonable.

name: Donna Ivery
text: Okay. I love that they have gluten free crust. I love the BYO pizza and salad. I love that my child and my mom and my niece and my nephew can all be satisfied at one place. Now, if they could only master gluten-free garlic knots...

name: Melissa W.
text: The pizza was bland, but the variety of crusts, sauces, and toppings offered is great. I may have to give it a second try with the hope that my first experience was a fluke. …More

name: Lisa Muller
text: They have fresh ingredients. The pizza is so good! Drinks are a great variety and wonderful lemonade. Tables were sticky all three times we have been there, so wondering about if it's the varnish or starting to worry... Floors too...

name: Addison Mitchell
text: Simply delicious! Juice drinks are thirst quenchers!

name: Dannon Monroe
text: Best service I've ever had at a Blaze Pizza before.  Thank you staff. My family appreciated the service

name: Hollie Manso
text: Amazing pizza!  Great prices and deals.  Love the ability to be able to fully customize your pie with the BYO deal for an amazing price.  I thinks it’s the red sauce, the original crust, the atmosphere, the friendly staff and all around …More

name: Stephen Stanaland
text: It's fun to make your own pizza, and they cook it nicely on their oven. No artificial colors or ingredients, and they have gluten free as well. I like that they are careful to change gloves and use a separate cutter.  Definitely try the build your own, looking at all the ingredients and picking them out is great.

name: Amanda Otie Pruett
text: I had the pleasure of ordering with Omar; very kind, polite and friendly. I will def be back again!

name: Maireem Morales
text: I went last night for my first time to Blaze pizza in Viera FL.Awesome service, and fast pace. I went last night with my 2 kids ( 5yr and 1 yr) and i had paid with wrong card and had to transfer money. the restaurant was sooo busy but Ally …More

name: Shanice
text: Fast, friendly and delicious!

name: Stephen Thaggard
text: Best Pizza, Knots and service!  Always worth the drive!

name: Rebecca Cruz
text: These guys are wonderful! Always so fast and friendly, even when there’s a crowd you can’t get these guys to slow down! I always refer people to them!

name: Jeremy Snobl
text: Great prices and awesome food. Located in an up and coming area in Viera.

name: ken couturier
text: was in the area so ordered one to try. Glad it is far enough away that I won't order again. Overpriced and not particularly good. Sticking with  local pizza restaurants.

name: Karen A. Draper
text: Love, love love blaze pizza. Clean and friendly with great tasting food. Having food allergies this is a place I feel safe eating.

name: traeisha Bell
text: Pizza is so good!! My fiance and I always get the build your own.  This location is so clean and well kept.  The staff are nice and very friendly ! Make you feel welcomed ! 5 stars !!

name: Jessica Acosta
text: I recommend getting the 11" pizzas, they taste better and are thinner than the shareable large.  Superior customer service

name: Charna Berry
text: Awesome place for a personal pizza. Great choices for toppings on pizza. Dough knots are great as well. Had the salad and it was fine. Service is prompt and they don't mind adding extra of your choice of topping when asked to add a little more.

name: Geno Koshar
text: Great food, but the staff was unreal ,so nice the way all restaurants should be .

name: Tiffany Daniels
text: They have very yummy pizza! It's great how you can go down the line and tell them exactly what you want on your pizza! The juice they have there was excellent!

name: Lilli Aviles
text: My pizza was burned on the bottom, so after two slices it wasn't edible anymore. The garlic knots were good, and I appreciate the unique way of making your own pizza. Unfortunately, I probably won't be back.

name: Dustin Ruberto
text: Great pizza.  Super friendly staff.

name: Curtis Brent Bozeman
text: Excellent food and excellent service, we loved it will be back soon.

name: Luis Torres
text: I like the place. Very welcoming. It's a personal pizza and you can add different toppings. The pizza is good but I would rather eat pizza from a real pizzeria.

name: Madison Bailey
text: Best vegan pizza!

name: Melodie Dawson
text:
Amazing people, willing to help.
Wonderful family atmosphere, Amazing Food!!

name: Sharon Connelly
text: We had our daughters birthday party there today. Pizza was good but what impressed us even more was the service. All the staff was happy and friendly and accommodating. The two managers on Toni and Shark(?) Were absolutely amazing from …More

name: Betsy Torres
text:
Nice place to eat😊
Employees were doing their jobs right.
Great place to hangout with your families, and friends 👍
Pizza was good too😋🍕🥤

name: Zackary Chairvolotti
text: Tried the keto crust pizza, it was excellent!! Tasted just like the real thing ♥️

name: Thomas Riley
text: You get to make your own pizza great price point and the pizza was excellent as usual have eaten here several times if you're looking for a pizza that has different then go to blaze it's really good it's in the Avenues over in Viera

name: Samm S
text: This location seems like they really have it together. Clean, fast, good customer service, and tasty food. We did the take 2 which is a half salad and half pizza but the salad is huge. It was perfect and an amazing price for what you get.

name: Sandi Garzzillo
text: There food is amazing.There salad is to die for.Everyone there is so nice.This is one of my favorite places to eat in Viera!

name: Russell Pells
text:
Disgusting travesty for a restaurant.  Went in to order a to go margarita pizza.  There were 2 customers inside and a family outside.
When I told the person at the order counter what I wanted, I was told that I …More

name: Lily Miller
text: Very good place, I've been about 10 times now. Love it

name: Norma Jones
text: Fast and efficient process for personalized, gluten free pizza. Crust is light and crispy, sauce is tomato goodness, and toppings are fresh and diverse. Service is friendly and courteous. Dining, both inside and alfresco on the patio, is clean and comfortable.

name: Joshua Smith
text: Quick, quality service. It's great that you can get gluten-free and dairy-free pizza if you have allergies. They do glove changes and use fresh ingredients, isolate the crusts while storing and in the oven, and are very conscientious. And obviously getting a "build your own" means you get exactly what you want.

name: Ryan Sands
text: They are fast and everything always comes out great!  I eat here every week sometime for lunch.

name: Brian Larson
text: This is a solid pizza joint, for sure. It is set up in a way that lets you easily customize your pizza to your exact tastes with a great variety of toppings, spices, and sauces, and it doesn't cost anything more to go crazy with it, which …More

name: Jessica Patterson
text: It is a nice casual dining area. The food was amazing and the staff was very friendly. Good drink options. Fast service and clean place. I would give it more stars if I could.

name: Kenn
text: Loved this place!  Great pizza and  reasonable prices.   Big salads.  The tomato sauce tastes great.

name: Brian Vath
text: Did the online ordering. All the pizzas weren't ready at the pickup time, 3 of them were, getting cold waiting on the last one and they forgot some ingredients ordered on that pizza. I think they really need a heat lamp or something to keep pizzas ordered on line hot or at least warm. Every time I have ordered online, the pizza is cold.

name: Cassandra Schutte
text: Delicious! My husband was able enjoy a GF cauliflower crust without it tasting undercooked! He asked for the glove change due to cross contamination, a new line person came over and informed him of all the toppings that were safe while he …More

name: Mishka Liamkin
text: Pretty fast, but there are long lines during peak hours. Pizza is good

name: Derek Jones
text: Our family go to pizza place.

name: Zack Duke
text: Pizza was amazing!!! Im a pepperoni pizza freak and that was high up on my pizza scale! They show you as they put the toppings on and it seems similar to subway. Very fast service. Pricing for the food wasm't bad at all. Good job!

name: Matthew Gregory
text: Came here for dinner. Pizza crust thin. They say fast fired. Cooks so fast the pizza sauce is Luke warm.

name: Zach Green
text: It was  very good pizza.  I will definitely be back

name: Kar Wat
text: Love Blaze! Their staff is great and pizza delicious! They customize your personal pizza however you like and they make sure they get it right.
